alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 8:27PM CDT until May 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR WESTERN MITCHELL...EAST CENTRAL ROOKS...SOUTHERN SMITH AND OSBORNE COUNTIES... At 826 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Downs to 10 miles north of Luray to near Natoma, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. In addition, at 819 PM CDT, a Kansas State University mesonet station near Osborne reported a 58 MPH wind gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Osborne, Downs, Cawker City, Natoma, Tipton, Woodston, Gaylord, Alton, Portis, Hunter, Harlan, Cedar and Victor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
